plot outline: Garuda Gamana Vrishabha Vahana features two males leads, Rishab Shetty as well as the actor-director Raj B Shetty; produced by Raj B Shetty, Ravi Rai Kalasa and Vachan Shetty under Lighter Buddha Films. The music for the film has been scored by Midhun Mukundan and the film is releasing on November 19th 2021.
title: Garuda Gamana Vrishabha Vahana
plot: Set in the backdrop of the coastal and cultural city of modern-day Mangaluru, Hari and his soulmate Shiva rise together to great heights only to face off as bitter enemies resulting to their own downfall and destruction.

_Garuda Gamana Vrishabha Vahana_ (qv) features two males leads, Rishab Shetty as well as the actor-director Raj B Shetty; produced by Raj B Shetty, Ravi Rai Kalasa and Vachan Shetty under Lighter Buddha Films. The music for the film has been scored by Midhun Mukundan and the film is releasing on November 19th 2021.::Manasa C P
